committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Hoc Task Force on Presidential Pay Recommendation

official_title: A bill to provide that pay increases recently proposed by the President for Members of Congress be made contingent on meeting certain deficit-reduction targets set by the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

summary.text: Provides that the pay increase for Members of Congress recommended by the President on January 5, 1987, pursuant to the Federal Salary Act of 1967 be made contingent on meeting the deficit-reduction requirements of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) for FY 1988 and 1989.

titles.title: A bill to provide that pay increases recently proposed by the President for Members of Congress be made contingent on meeting certain deficit-reduction targets set by the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
